Pre-Game Insights: Canada coach Jesse Marsch said they will have to be the best they've ever played and it still might not be enough
Argentina will be at peak intensity after being one match away from reaching another Copa América final
Miscellaneous Highlights: Canada's rise at the competition has been personified by Jacob Shaffelburg
Argentina has kept 14 clean sheets in 18 matches since winning the 2022 FIFA World Cup in Qatar
Others: Argentina has won 15 Copa América tournaments, including the most recent edition in 2021
The match will go directly to penalties if tied after 90 minutes
Canada will face the losing team of the other semifinal in the third-place game on July 13
